channel.title: Karpoke - Just another Pelican blog - distributionerror

item.title: Solucionado el error «DistributionNotFound» al usar pip
item.description:
Si al ejecutar pip, nos aparece el siguiente error:

$ pip
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/local/bin/pip", line 5, in
    from pkg_resources import load_entry_point
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/pkg_resources.py", line 2707, in
    working_set.require(__requires__)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/pkg_resources.py", line …
item.dc:creator: Nacho Cano
